source.query: SELECT SpecialOfferID as special_offer_id , Description as description , DiscountPct as discount_pct , Type as type , Category as category , cast(StartDate as char) as start_Date , cast(EndDate as char) as end_Date , MinQty as min_qty , MaxQty as max_qty , cast(ModifiedDate as char) as modified_date FROM specialoffer Where ModifiedDate > '${last_modified_date}'
